name: Oddzone
description:
Story: 

A village falls to a mysterious sickness seemingly brought on by monsters. A dingbat girl (Joni) and her sassy cat (Jam) mistakenly inherit a super secret magic sword and get sent on a quest to the "Oddzone" in order to find a cure.

Features:

  • Action RPG Combat
  • Humor
  • Interactive story
  • 16-bit graphics
  • Many different enemies

Controls:

  • Z: Weapon
  • S: Use Item
  • Q & W: Open quickmenu and cycle through items, skills, etc.
  • X: Cancel
  • Enter: Select and Weapon
  • Arrow keys:  Move

Oddzone is a work in progress and I want to release this as a full game. Currently the game takes around 20-30 minutes to complete. Any support is appreciated! 

Please enjoy!
